lead_paragraph: Bridgepoint Capital is in exclusive talks to buy and merge the French jewelers Histoire d'Or and Marc Orian, Bloomberg News reported, while The Financial Times noted that transactions in which a company is sold to its third private equity owner will this week reach $2.1 billion.

headline.main: Amid Tertiary Deals, Bridgepoint Talks to Jewelers

abstract: Bridgepoint Capital is in exclusive talks to buy and merge the French jewelers Histoire d'Or and Marc Orian, Bloomberg News reported, while The Financial Times noted that transactions in which a company is sold to its third private equity owner will this week reach $2.1 billion.
